about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better: my background, interests, and what drives me as an AI Engineer and a web developer.
about.hello: Hello! I'm Erfan Asadi, an AI engineer and web developer based in
about.bio1: I'm a passionate AI engineer and web developer with expertise in creating robust, scalable applications and conducting cutting-edge research in artificial intelligence.
about.bio2: With dual experience in both industry and academia, I bring a unique perspective to solving complex problems. I'm particularly interested in the intersection of web technologies and machine learning.
about.bio3: When I'm not coding or researching, you can find me biking, cooking, reading about new technologies, or contributing to open-source projects.
